name: Paris Snacks
keywords: bread crumbs, ground beef, side dish, winter
recipeIngredient: 1 pound top-quality beef, ground twice (see note)
4 tablespoons bread crumbs, soaked in 1/4 cup milk and drained

recipeInstructions.text: Mix first 6 ingredients thoroughly by hand.
Spread bread slices thickly with butter and fry on buttered side until golden brown.
Remove from pan, spread fried side of slices thickly with meat mixture and fry, meat side first, for 1 to 2 minutes. Turn and brown on the other side.
